name: app_tokens
summary: Learn how to create, view, and delete App Tokens

steps.title: Getting your App Tokens
steps.description: App Tokens are used for generating Kaltura Sessions, and can control what privileges are granted to the user. Use ```appToken.list``` to see all of your app tokens.

steps.title: Creating a new App Token
steps.description: Create a new app token by calling ```appToken.add```.  You can choose whether the session should have ADMIN or USER level privileges, and you can specify how long the session should last.
